description: Versatile Jonny Vaughan joins Salford Red Devils on loan from St Helens for the rest of the season.
title: Salford: St Helens youngster Jonny Vaughan joins on loan for season
title_page: Salford: St Helens youngster Jonny Vaughan joins on loan for season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Salford Red Devils have signed versatile St Helens youngster Jonny Vaughan on loan for the rest of the season.
Vaughan, 20, can play at either centre or as a back row forward, and made eight appearances for Saints last year, but none in the current campaign.
He is available to make his Salford debut in their Super League game away to champions Wigan Warriors on Sunday (15:00 BST).
The Red Devils are 11th in the table after their troubled start to the campaign on and off the pitch.
